column2: We must expand to secure our position! To this end we must officially stake claim to lands surrounding us.
We must claim Lorraine if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
We must claim Luxemburg if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
We must claim the Borderlands if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
We must claim the Rheinland if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
We must claim Coast if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
We must claim Northern France if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must expand quickly to defend ourselves.
We must accept the Belgians if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must pacify our minorities to defend ourselves.
We must accept the French if we wish to survive! Sandwiched between two great powers, we must pacify our minorities to defend ourselves.
